name: Vestibule
description: You are in a dimly lit room with a high ceiling

name: Entrance Hall
description: You find yourself in the entrance to the dungeon. It is a large room with a polished marble floor

name: Dark Corridor
description: You enter a dark and gloomy corridor

name: Brightly Lit Corridor
description: You find yourself in a brightly lit corridor

name: Treasure Chamber
description: Invaluable treasures from a long-forgotten era are scattered around the large, richly decorated chamber.
